title: Fit to Be Tied
description: The Last Good An Original Sinners novella told in five parts.Part Fit to Be TiedWith her feelings for Lance warring with her recent encounter with Soren, Nora returns to Lance's bed and finds herself toying with the idea of...toying with him on a permanent basis. But after she gets a glimpse into his personal angst, Nora realizes she has the power to rescue this white knight....
author: Tiffany Reisz
